game.name: Angelas Closet
game.description:
You would meet today with a very stylish and cute kitten in Angelas Closet. This modern kitten is blessed with a wardrobe that is full of trendy and fashionable outfits and other needful accessories. Her crowed wardrobe sometimes makes it difficult for her to spot some of her favorite beauty products, clothes and accessories. Today, she wants to go outside for a party, but is unable to spot the items. Would you help her out? Join this brand new dressing game and be prepared to spot some hidden objects! Also guide her to pick up a perfect party outfit!

Hurry up! She is waiting for your helping hand. Look at the bottom of the screen to check out the list of the times you have to find out in this html5 dress up game! Go through the room and click on the items you seek! Remember you have the limited time to complete the goal successfully. Do not bother if you get stuck since you can use the hint to spot the next item. But, you can use the hint options for only a few times. 

You would see your Angela wearing a cool outfit every time when you spot a right item on the screen. Once you are done with finding all the objects, move on to the next level of dressing her up with the perfect outfit. Give her an awesome dress and combine her look with a cool and pretty hat in this one of the best girls games! All the best to have a blast in our more popular games for girls that you can play online, no download required!
